projects.title: Global Development Dashboard
projects.description:
Using Azure Container Instances, Blob Storage, Logic Apps, and more to construct a cloud data pipeline that automatically fetches, cleans, structures, and stores global development data from live data feeds (UN SDGs, ND-GAIN, World Bank) that is visualized on a public interactive dashboard.

Constructing composite indexes and predictive models with NumPy and predictive modelling with regression and Holt-Winters smoothing.

Using Power BI to deliver a compelling interactive frontend deployed on the organization's redesigned website.

projects.title: Asynchronous Federated Learning Network
projects.description:
Engineering an asynchronous federated learning system for distributed IoT healthcare devices using the PyTorch and Flower frameworks and the PTB-XL ECG dataset from PhysioNet.

Implementing layer-wise parameter update scheduling to reduce network communication overhead while maintaining 75% ECG classification accuracy on 21K+ patient records.

Designed and deployed 1D CNN architecture with stratified shallow/deep layer separation for temporal pattern recognition in 12-lead ECG signals, optimizing model convergence through adaptive weight-update frequencies based on gradient magnitude analysis across distributed edge nodes.

projects.title: westernsalesclub.ca
projects.description:
The website for Western's first sales club, built to showcase the club's activities and mission.

This platform establishes the Western Sales Club at the forefront of sales at Western and as a major player in the university's club community. It serves as a professional gateway that helps the club acquire sponsors and high-profile clients for events and activities.
